intro: Aspidistra lurida, commonly known as the dark aspidistra, is a species native to Southeast Asia. It is a shade-tolerant evergreen perennial, characterized by its dark green, lance-shaped leaves. The plant belongs to the Araceae family, which includes many ornamental and tropical plants. Aspidistra lurida is valued for its elegant foliage and ability to thrive in low-light conditions. It is often used in indoor gardening and as a decorative plant in shaded outdoor areas.
